org.apache.flink.runtime.blob

类 BlobServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.blob.BlobServer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Runnable, BlobService

    public class BlobServer
extends Thread
implements BlobService
    This class implements the BLOB server. The BLOB server is responsible for listening for incoming requests and spawning threads to handle these requests. Furthermore, it takes care of creating the directory structure to store the BLOBs or temporarily cache them.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 java.lang.Thread

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      BlobServer(org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration config)
      Instantiates a new BLOB server and binds it to a free network port.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BlobServer

        public BlobServer(org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration config)
           throws IOException
        Instantiates a new BLOB server and binds it to a free network port.
        抛出:
        IOException - thrown if the BLOB server cannot bind to a free network port

      • getURL

        public URL getURL(BlobKey requiredBlob)
           throws IOException
        Method which retrieves the URL of a file associated with a blob key. The blob server looks the blob key up in its local storage. If the file exists, then the URL is returned. If the file does not exist, then a FileNotFoundException is thrown.
        指定者:
        getURL 在接口中 BlobService
        参数:
        requiredBlob - blob key associated with the requested file
        返回:
        URL of the file
        抛出:
        IOException

      • delete

        public void delete(BlobKey key)
            throws IOException
        This method deletes the file associated to the blob key if it exists in the local storage of the blob server.
        指定者:
        delete 在接口中 BlobService
        参数:
        key - associated with the file to be deleted
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getPort

        public int getPort()
        Returns the port on which the server is listening.
        指定者:
        getPort 在接口中 BlobService
        返回:
        port on which the server is listening

      • isShutdown

        public boolean isShutdown()
        Tests whether the BLOB server has been requested to shut down.
        返回:
        True, if the server has been requested to shut down, false otherwise.
